name: Diablo II: Lord of Destruction
description: Downloads and installs Diablo 2: Lord of Destruction expansion
notes:
- Should be installed over the same Wine Prefix (same path) as base Diablo II installation
- Install into C:\Program File (x86)\Diablo II
- P2P network used by downloader seems to not work (files are downloaded directly from Blizzard servers)
- starts in window
content:
files:
- installer:
    filename: Downloader_Diablo2_Lord_of_Destruction_enUS.exe
    url: https://www.battle.net/download/getLegacy?product=D2XP&locale=en-US&os=WIN
game:
  args: -w
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Diablo II/Diablo II.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: 4.3-x86_64
